== About Me ==

My name is Hassan Alsobari. I live in Yemen. I started out as php and a cross platform C/C++ developer, 
and that got me hooked with Qt. Currently I am working as a web developer using Python, php and Django.
I started using windows in year 1994 to 2000, After having all the fun that I can get and deciding to do some real work Ubuntu was my distro of choice. now I have a team of 13 people .. This is the official website of the team: <nowiki>[[http://www.liioiil.com|TTMTT TEAM]]</nowiki> .
